header.title: Emission-free driving around Belgium with Greenbikes
header.header-text: Find out how to rent a Greenbike from any major city in Belgium. Greenbikes are cheap, healthy and you don't suffer from traffic jams.

infoSections.par_1: Cycling and walking are the best for the environment.
infoSections.par_2: For only 3.14 euros you can rent a bike
infoSections.par_4: You can rent a bike in a few steps

blok_1.title: 1: Register
blok_1.par: Login or register an account on our website.

blok_2.title: 2: Options
blok_2.par: Choose your type of bike that suits you. The location where you will pick up the bicycle and for how long you wish to cycle.

blok_3.title: 3: Borrow
blok_3.par: Borrow the bike at the agreed time.

questions.title: Possible questions
questions.question1: 1: When can I use a Greenbike?
questions.question1_answer: You can pick up and use a Greenbike at any time of the day. You will also have the opportunity to rent a Greenbike for a longer period if you wish.
questions.question2: 2: What should I do in the event of theft or damage to my Greenbike?
questions.question2_answer: If your Greenbike is stolen, you must call the police as soon as possible. You then send the official report to Greenbike. In the event that your Greenbike is damaged, you must return the bicycle to the nearest parking spot. You can then send an email to one of the MCT teachers in Howest. They will be happy to personally deliver you a new bicycle.
questions.question3: 3: Do I get a lock with my Greenbike?
questions.question3_answer: Every Greenbike is equipped with a bicycle lock and a chain lock. Outside the locks, every Greenbike is also provided with a basket on the front of the bicycle. You can place your chain lock here.

container.extra: - Equipped with a bicycle lock and a chain lock. Provide extra basket
container.helm: - Helmet and other accessories for sale separately in our webshop
container.error: There are no more bicycles available
